column1: Jeez Butters, thanks for bringing me yet another customer. Here's your two dollar cut again.
Oh, that'd be great, but I can't do kisses before school. I have swimming class.
Wow, you're right Butters. I should start expanding.
Wow, that's a great idea, Butters.
Oh ho ho ho.  Un chaka solo david. Saime no Chewbacca dakaiminbi? ho ho.
Oh? Makarendae bi cho.  Ho ho ho.
Jonoba unko chocolate Yum Yum bar ancho?
Juodo nakahobi? Ho ho ho ho.
Oh ho ho ho ho ho ho.
No! You want Ike to be president.
I think the ballot were misleading. Some kids didn't understand whom they were voting for.
No, I'm saying that because you are a boogerface!
Yeah. It doesn't make any sense.
Mmm, talk to me, kosher boy.
Jason has a huge bulge. You're gonna get it, boys.
